description: Tests structured in progressive complexity levels to validate logic and functional capacity

level_1.name: Direct Attribute Extraction
level_1.description: Single-hop queries requiring direct extraction from node attributes

queries.query: What is the well name for well 15_9-13?
queries.ground_truth: Sleipner East Appr

queries.query: What is the unit of measurement for the DEPT curve?
queries.ground_truth: m (meters)

queries.query: What does the NPHI curve measure?
queries.ground_truth: NPHI measures neutron porosity

queries.query: List all curve mnemonics that contain the word LITHOFACIES
queries.ground_truth: FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES_LITHOLOGY, FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES_CONFIDENCE

queries.query: What is the domain of the GR curve?
queries.ground_truth: subsurface well log

level_2.name: Single Relationship Traversal
level_2.description: Queries requiring traversal of one relationship edge

queries.query: What curves belong to well 15_9-13?
queries.ground_truth: 21 curves including DEPT, GR, NPHI, RHOB, DTC, etc.

queries.query: Which well does the GR curve belong to?
queries.ground_truth: Well 15_9-13 (Sleipner East Appr)

queries.query: What is the document that contains curve NPHI?
queries.ground_truth: LAS document for well 15_9-13

queries.query: How many curves does the document for well 15_9-13 contain?
queries.ground_truth: 21 curves

queries.query: List the first 5 curves in well 15_9-13
queries.ground_truth: DEPT, FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES_CONFIDENCE, FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES_LITHOLOGY, CALI, MUDWEIGHT

level_3.name: Multi-Hop Reasoning
level_3.description: Queries requiring multiple relationship traversals or conditional logic

queries.query: Does well 15_9-13 have both gamma ray and neutron porosity curves?
queries.ground_truth: Yes, it has GR (gamma ray) and NPHI (neutron porosity)

queries.query: Find curves in well 15_9-13 that measure resistivity
queries.ground_truth: RDEP, RSHA, RMED, RXO (resistivity curves)

queries.query: What curves in well 15_9-13 have units in ohm.m?
queries.ground_truth: RDEP, RSHA, RMED, RXO all have units of ohm.m

queries.query: Which curves in well 15_9-13 are used for porosity calculation?
queries.ground_truth: NPHI (neutron porosity), RHOB (density), DTC (sonic) are used for porosity calculation

queries.query: Among the curves in well 15_9-13, which ones measure depth?
queries.ground_truth: DEPT measures depth, DEPTH_MD is measured depth

level_4.name: Aggregation and Cross-Entity Analysis
level_4.description: Queries requiring aggregation, counting, or comparison across multiple entities

queries.query: Count how many curves in well 15_9-13 have underscore in their mnemonic
queries.ground_truth: At least FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES_CONFIDENCE, FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES_LITHOLOGY, DEPTH_MD (3+)

queries.query: What percentage of curves in well 15_9-13 are resistivity logs?
queries.ground_truth: 4 out of 21 curves (approximately 19%)

queries.query: Group the curves in well 15_9-13 by their measurement type
queries.ground_truth: Groups: depth (DEPT, DEPTH_MD), resistivity (RDEP, RSHA, RMED, RXO), porosity (NPHI, RHOB), lithology (FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES), etc.

queries.query: Which curve types appear in well 15_9-13 but are not standard triple combo logs?
queries.ground_truth: Non-triple-combo curves: FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES (2), MUDWEIGHT, ROP, CALI, resistivity logs, SP

queries.query: Compare the number of lithology curves vs porosity curves in well 15_9-13
queries.ground_truth: 2 lithology curves (FORCE_2020_LITHOFACIES_*) vs 2-3 porosity curves (NPHI, RHOB, possibly DTC)

level_5.name: Synthesis and Inference
level_5.description: Queries requiring inference, domain knowledge application, and synthesis

queries.query: Based on the available curves in well 15_9-13, can you perform a complete petrophysical evaluation?
queries.ground_truth: Yes, the well has GR, NPHI, RHOB, DTC, and resistivity logs needed for petrophysical evaluation

queries.query: What log suite classification does well 15_9-13 belong to?
queries.ground_truth: Extended triple combo (has GR, NPHI, RHOB, DTC) plus additional resistivity and lithology logs

queries.query: If you needed to identify hydrocarbon-bearing zones in well 15_9-13, what curves would you use and why?
queries.ground_truth: Use resistivity logs (RDEP, RSHA, RMED, RXO) for hydrocarbon detection, NPHI-RHOB crossover for gas zones

queries.query: What is the most likely geological setting for well 15_9-13 based on available curve types?
queries.ground_truth: Norwegian Sea offshore setting (Sleipner field) with clastic reservoir rocks

queries.query: Given the curve suite in well 15_9-13, what advanced interpretations are possible vs impossible?
queries.ground_truth: Possible: lithology ID, porosity calc, saturation analysis. Impossible: NMR analysis (no NMR logs), dipmeter analysis (no dipmeter)

validation_framework.pass_criteria: Must pass level N before attempting level N+1
